title: bitbollo
author: bitbollo
created_time: April 14, 2023, 09:15:11 PMLast edit: April 22, 2023, 05:49:19 AM by bitbollo
content: THE ART ON "CINDERELLA"ArtiKanDo Collection by giammangiato* QuoteIn philately, a cinderella stamp is "virtually anything resembling a postage stamp, but not issued for postal purposes by a government postal administration".ProjectIt was the 19th April of 2022 and Artikando had presented its first bitcoin-themed artistic work.After a year, his second idea... arrives to public!This time there is a "special stamp" ... a Cinderella!  (also known as "back of the book stamps", or erinnophile).Obviously they can be used as a stamp... in addition to the price that would be paid for a shipment, or as a "back of the book for closing a letter"  In short, this a limited edition collectible (20 sheets produced - 2 already reserved by authors).Each sheet is notched and gummed like a classic postage stamp.The proofs were prepared on card stock or A4 paper. No Gum.The mini sheets were printed on Fabriano paper (weight greater than A4).Release Details* “Cryptoverse” limited supply 20 items realized* with 28 stamps/labels each one. Hand numbered with pencil [with UV ink]   *2 already reserved by authors* “Proof of print 81” 1 item, printed in cardboard paper, with nominal value of 1000 satoshi for each stamp (81 stamps/labels) * “Mini Sheet Essays Moonwalk” 2 items, hand numbered with 8 stamps/labels [with UV ink]* “Mini Sheet Essays Jumping” 2 items, hand numbered with 8 stamps/labels [with UV ink] * “Mini Sheet Moonwalk” 9 items hand numbered with 8 stamps/labels each one [with UV ink]* “Mini Sheet Jumping” 9 items hand numbered with 8 stamps/labels each one [with UV ink]* “Proof of print 49” , 1 item. Printed in classic paper, nominal value of 1000 satoshi for each stamp (49 stamps/labels)* “Proof of print 4” 1 item. Printed in classic paper, nominal value of 1000 satoshi for each stamp (4 stamps)* “Mini Sheet Moonwalk - Error print” 2 items hand numbered with 8 stamps/labels each one * “Astronaut 1 Zen” (Original drawing by hand) 1 item * “Astronaut 2 Moonwalk” (Original drawing by hand)  1 item* “Astronaut 3 Jumping” (Original drawing by hand) 1 item*   “Earth” (Original drawing by hand)  1 item* “Moon” (Original drawing by hand)  1 itemWhat authors says?Cryptoverse is for obvious reasons the achievement of Astrobit's beloved crypto realm.The jump and moonwalk is where the "astronaut" takes action! He starts to dance, "jumps because  is happy". Here in this moment he discovers the real potential of these innovations (obviously "B" is at the center, just look at the details  )Even for this work, all the drawings you will see are original and created by Artikando with a BIC pen. Yes, just a pen and fantasy! Even though this is a sales topic, we gladly accept criticism and/or advice to continuously improve ourselves!Auction of Limited EditionEach piece will therefore be unique and unrepeatable because they are numbered by hand.Bid Format: BTCStarting Bid: 0.0000000 BTC for each lotMinimum Bid Increment: 0.00010000 BTCAuction End Time:  21 Apr 2023 - 19:00  (EDT)Shipping:  On 4-6 May 2023. Tracked/Registered. To be paid by buyers.Payment Address: bc1qm9wnwsgy52jdefvm5g4w72lxqep5d9ks4gq62p or 1BoSH7RisUAPpGfNbX8scSB43YP6Tx3g7M unless using escrow at your expensePayment Due:Within 24 hoursAUCTION TERMS11 LOTS!  Lot 1 (5 items) Cryptoverse 1/20 + Mini Sheet Moonwalk 1/9Mini Sheet Jumping 1/9 Mini Sheet Essays Moonwalk 1/2 Mini Sheet Essays Jumping 1/2[both essays, hand numbered with 8 stamps/labels each one [with UV ink]]Lot 2 (5 items)Cryptoverse 2/20 + Mini Sheet Moonwalk 2/9 +Mini Sheet Jumping 2/9 Mini Sheet Essays Moonwalk 2/2 Mini Sheet Essays Jumping 2/2[both essays, hand numbered with 8 stamps/labels each one [with UV ink]]Lot 3 (3 items)Cryptoverse 3/20 + Mini Sheet Moonwalk 3/9Mini Sheet Jumping 3/9Lot 4 (3 items)Cryptoverse 4/20 + Mini Sheet Moonwalk 4/9Mini Sheet Jumping 4/9Lot 5 (3 items)Cryptoverse 5/20 + Mini Sheet Moonwalk 5/9Mini Sheet Jumping 5/9Lot 6 (3 items)Cryptoverse 6/20 + Mini Sheet Moonwalk 6/9Mini Sheet Jumping 6/9Lot 7 (3 items)Cryptoverse 7/20 + Mini Sheet Moonwalk 7/9Mini Sheet Jumping 7/9Lot 8 (3 items)Cryptoverse 8/20 + Mini Sheet Moonwalk 8/9Mini Sheet Jumping 8/9Lot 9 (3 items)Cryptoverse 9/20 + Mini Sheet Moonwalk 9/9Mini Sheet Jumping 9/9Lot X (1 item)Proof of print 811 item, printed in cardboard paper, nominal value of 1000 satoshi for each stamp (81 stamps/labels - No Keys provided!), Mint, No Gum! Lot Y (1 item)Astronaut 1 Zen (Original drawing by hand) 1 itemFree with all lots =1 banknote "Sophia Loren - Moor's Head" with 100.000 ZEC as face value. Only 20 printed*2 already reserved by authors - first edition not numbered! *2 already reserved by authors

comments.author: tweetious
comments.body: what is the difference between the "Mini Sheet" and the "Mini Sheet Essays" (except for the vertical text on the right side)Are both on Fabriano paper with the exact same dimensions? Are they "notched and gummed like a classic postage stamp" -on the backside- ?

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: tweetious on April 14, 2023, 09:58:23 PMwhat is the difference between the "Mini Sheet" and the "Mini Sheet Essays" (except for the vertical text on the right side)Are both on Fabriano paper with the exact same dimensions? Are they "notched and gummed like a classic postage stamp" -on the backside- ?Yes is correct, "mini sheet essays" have no value on the right side and are numbered/named on the back. Both have same specific, unperforated, without gum and Fabriano paper.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: The stamp designs came out very well indeed.  Most importantly the perforations look just like a postal stamps ones....unlike some cinderella stamps that don't do it right.    What is the perf size for these stamps by the way? For those who are not familiar with stamps, they come in different perf holes per certain area.     The standard for measuring is the number of perforations found in 2 centimeters (20 mm).    Good luck with the auction...will be sure to monitor this!

comments.author: Iced
comments.body: WOW bitbollo! You know that I am also a stamp collector/seller and I've got some Errinophilia in my collection as Belgium & Germany had a lot of Errinophilia.For me, this is a no-brainer  as krogoth asked what is the perf size?Lot 1: 0.0006 BTC

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Just noticed this post, uhhh they Do look pretty for sure!Imagine this design on an official postage stamp. Would be a dream come true. Ideally within a limited edition.Lot 9: 0.0005Lot Y: 0.0006

comments.body: Current High bids!Quote from: Cyrus on April 14, 2023, 11:55:48 PMLot 3: 0.0004BTCLot 4: 0.0004BTCLot 5: 0.0004BTCLot 7: 0.0004BTCLot 8: 0.0004BTCLot X: 0.0004BTCQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on April 15, 2023, 01:28:20 PMLot 6: .001 BTCQuote from: aoluain on April 15, 2023, 01:51:55 PMLot 1: 0.0005Lot 2: 0.0005Quote from: Kryptowerk on April 16, 2023, 06:37:42 AMLot 9: 0.0005Lot Y: 0.0006Daily Bump! Thanks for all your comments and questions.@IcedThis type of objects have their own niche of interest among collectors. Thematic collections of "cinderella" with a hundred pieces can easily exceed 3000 euros (for example, aviation,politics or industry theme). I have sold recently a collection and there was interest for the same item from multiple countries/buyers.@krogothmanhattan @IcedStamps are perforated with method "blocks" at 13 1/2. No variety has been identified/errors during this process of production.  @Kryptowerk"Cinderella stamps" could not be used as regular stamp... but can be used in addiction to regular stamps!  I will (probably) use one sheet to create some "postal history" cover.  Auction End Time:  21 Apr 2023 - 19:00  (EDT)
